column1: Little Goat Diner////I am a huge Top Chef fan so when my husband and I were in Chicago in October
column2: we were hoping to get a reservation at Girl & the Goat (which was impossible).  Luckily
column3: we were able to grab a lunch res at Little Goat
column4: and we could not have been more happy with our meal.  The biggest highlight was that they had a dairy-free menu for my husband who is allergic to dairy.  Not all restaurants a. understand what a dairy allergy means or b. go out of their way to accommodate to it
column5: and we were extremely impressed with Little Goat's take on it.  We decided to split a few items off that menu
